pushNotifications.driverArriving: Your car reaches your pickup "{{stopPoint}}" in {{etaMinutes}} minutes

futureRideCanceled.heading: Sorry, we cannot service your ride
futureRideCanceled.text: We are currently unable to find a driver for your ride - please try again

futureRideFleetCancel.heading: Sorry, we cannot service your ride
futureRideFleetCancel.text: We're sorry, the future booking you made cannot be served. Please make another booking for a different available time.

failureRide.heading: Sorry, we cannot service your ride
failureRide.text: We're sorry, your order could not be served right now. Please try again soon.

rideReject.heading: Sorry, we cannot service your ride
rideReject.text: Sorry, we couldn't find an available driver right now. Please try again soon.

findingNewDriver.heading: Sorry, we cannot service your ride
findingNewDriver.text: We're finding a different driver for you now - we'll update momentarily.

activatingFutureRide.heading: Your Ride Has Been Activated
activatingFutureRide.text: Get ready to meet your driver at "{{stopPoint}}"

emailTemplate.p1: Please confirm your email by tapping the link below
emailTemplate.issues: If you encounter any issues please contact
emailTemplate.ignore: If you think this email wasn't meant for you, please ignore it.
